data.text: @SAPoliceNews Spy planes flying at night disrupting people's sleeping habits whether they know it or not ought to sue the operator and turning anti collision lights off isn't fulling anyone. Operate with normal hours please 🙏 and if doesn't belong to SAPOL sorry. Be transparent though 😉
